name: Midwife of Madness
description:
You awaken in an arctic cavern, the blank white sky above a reflection of your mind. There is nothing on your mind, yet deep inside it, you feel a burning attachment to the creature in the cavern.   

Midwife of Madness is an explorational platformer puzzle game where you help an Eldrich being spread its seeds of corruption. You wish to strengthen it and free it from the temple it has been trapped in. The being is generous to those who help it, so as you aid it you gain powers to use in the service of the creature.  Use WASD to move, click to pick up the seed, and click again to throw it.

You must help it. You must fuel its seeds. This is your future. 

 

Game created by Connor, Dominykas, Jarrod, and Megan for the K-State 9th annual spring game jam

Sound effects credits:

Footsteps_Boots_Gritty_Ground_(Gravel).wav by Nox_Soun
